processing_structure.text: Specify input and output: one integer, sum of its divisors
Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: You have clear top-level steps; confirm the program needs one integer input and must print the sum of its divisors.
Decide the needed variables (an integer for input, an accumulator for the sum) and that you will use a for-loop from 1 to the input checking divisibility.
Begin coding by implementing the first comment: add code to read one integer into a variable (e.g., n). Then initialize sum to 0 before writing the loop.
